video_title: The truth behind MOTIVATION you need to know  #motivation #adviceoftheday #mindsetpodcast
transcript:
so how do you have more motivation right
people always ask this question I think
the problem is there's a really big
misconception is that you need to be
motivated to take action you don't
actually to be honest with you studies
show the exact opposite is true research
shows that motivation often follows
action not the other way around so you
don't need to feel good or be motivated
in order to take action you need to take
action to give yourself a chance at
feeling good or feeling motivated
